SEARCH
Package edu.baylor.GroupFive.database.services

Class TransactionService

java.lang.Object
edu.baylor.GroupFive.database.services.TransactionService
public class TransactionService extends Object
The TransactionService class contains static methods related to managing transactions in our database.
Author:
Brendon

  • Method Details

    • getTransaction

      public static Transaction getTransaction(long id)
      Searches our database for a transaction with a given id. If the transaction exists in our database, it is returned. Otherwise a null object is returned.
      Parameters:
      id - Id of transaction.
      Returns:
      Transaction if it exists. null otherwise.

    • getTransactions

      public static List<Transaction> getTransactions()
      Gets all transactions in our database.
      Returns:
      A List containing all transactions in our database.

    • getUserTransactions

      public static List<Transaction> getUserTransactions(String username)
      Gets all transactions tied to a User with username username.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of user.
      Returns:
      A List containing all transactions tied to username.

    • getCurrentGuestTransactions

      public static List<Reservation> getCurrentGuestTransactions()
      Gets all transactions tied to the currently logged in user.
      Returns:
      A List containing all transactions.

    • addTransaction

      public static void addTransaction(String username, String description, float amount)
      Links a transaction to a user and adds it to our database.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the User
      description - Transaction description
      amount - Value of transaction

    • updateTransaction

      public static void updateTransaction(Transaction transaction)
      Updates a transaction in our database.
      Parameters:
      transaction - Transaction with updated information.

    • deleteTransaction

      public static void deleteTransaction(Transaction transaction)
      Deletes a transaction in our database.
      Parameters:
      transaction - Transaction to delete.
